title: Smart Agriculture Techniques: How Farmers Achieve High-Yield Cucumber Cultivation

tasks.task: Construct and maintain a greenhouse for melon cultivation.
subtasks: Set up ventilation and temperature control systems.

tasks.task: Prepare soil and plant melon seeds.
subtasks: Loosen the soil in the greenhouse.

tasks.task: Irrigate plants using a drip system.
subtasks: Ensure proper watering and nutrient delivery.
Adjust lighting duration according to cucumber needs.
Either hand-pollinate using brushes or introduce honeybees.
Regularly check plant health and growth.
Pack cucumbers into boxes or bags with ventilation holes.
Load packed cucumbers onto transportation vehicles.
